locations.name: Dragon's Reach Keep
locations.description: An imposing castle perched on a rugged cliffside, overlooking the churning seas below. The keep is home to the fearless Knights of the Azure Flame.

locations.name: Eldergrove Forest
locations.description: A vast, ancient forest filled with towering trees, mysterious creatures, and whispers of forgotten magic. It is said that the forest holds secrets from an age long past.

locations.name: Rivenstone Village
locations.description: A quaint village nestled at the edge of Eldergrove Forest. Its cobblestone streets and cozy cottages are home to a community of farmers, crafters, and storytellers.

characters.name: Elara Willowshade
characters.description: A mysterious wood elf with deep ties to the magic of the forest. Elara is a healer and a guardian of the natural world, often seen with her companion owl, Astra.

characters.name: Enemy Mercenary
characters.description: A figure cloaked in obsidian, leader of the shadowy intruders at Dragon's Reach Keep, rumored to wield power extracted from the abyss.

characters.name: Merric Greenfoot
characters.description: A jovial halfling bard who delights in sharing tales of adventure and song. Merric is beloved by the villagers for his wit and charm.

characters.name: Sir Gareth the Brave
characters.description: A valiant knight known for his unwavering courage and loyalty. Sir Gareth is the leader of the Knights of the Azure Flame, sworn to protect the realm from any threat.
